StepData.description: Welcome to the island! This area will act as our initial Habitat to help train your Chimeras and restore the land.
Much of the world has been ruined during the Calamity but that has long since passed.
Nonetheless, the negative effects of that disaster continue to harm the region.
We can start restoring the land and gathering resources by sending your Chimera out on an Expedition.
Well at the moment that's just me, but I'll do my best!
Let's click on the portal to get started!
Here we can see all of our available Expeditions and their properties.
We currently only have access to one Expedition, but don't worry I know we'll unlock more with a little hard work!
Let's select one to get started.
On the left side, you can add Chimeras to your Expedition Party. Up to 3 Chimera can go on a single Expedition.
More powerful Chimeras will typically offer a higher success chance.
Using Chimeras with recommended traits will provide a significant bonus so be sure to pay attention to what the Expedition is looking for!
Recommended traits include the Fire, Water, and Grass elements and the Exploration, Stamina, and Wisdom stats.
All Chimeras in your Expedition Party will lose some energy but that will restore on its own with enough time.
Once your Expedition Party is ready, click the Confirm button and see if your expedition is a success!
Amazing work! Thanks to your success, we were able to gather the materials needed to restore our first Facility!
Facilities can be used to train Chimera stats to improve their success rate on Expeditions. Stats also provide some other benefits.
An Expedition Party's total Exploration will help decrease the duration of Expeditions.
Stamina will increase a Chimera's total energy.
And Expedition Parties with a high Wisdom will bring back more loot.
Each Facility will train a specific stat so let's unlock them all so your Chimeras become super powerful!
To train a Chimera, we will first need Essence.
This resource is gained by mining blue crystals that appear around the Habitat as well as from Essence Expeditions.
Essence crystals can be mined about three times.
Once you have enough, drag me over to the highlighted area to begin my training.
Looks like we found some Fossils and supplies to restore the Temple on our last Expedition.
Click on the Temple to see what Chimera you can restore with Fossils.
Going on more Fossil Expeditions should help us discover more Chimera to restore.
Wow looks like all those Expeditions are paying off!
We've been able to restore part of the Stone Plains thanks to your hard work!
Now that the Habitat has been upgraded, more crystals will appear and their Essence will be worth more.
